articles.author: Robert Lea
articles.title: Europe's JUICE Jupiter explorer probe takes 1st space 'selfies' on its way to gas giant (photos) - Space.com
articles.description: JUICE bids a fond farewell to Earth as it heads out on its first orbit of the sun.
articles.content:
The Jupiter Icy Moons Explorer (JUICE) spacecraft has taken its first "selfies" from space, catching stunning images with Earth as a backdrop.

articles.title: JUICE spacecraft launched to investigate the habitability of Jupiter's icy moons - The Verge

articles.content:
